tool_description:
Giphy is an animated GIF search engine.

The Giphy API implements a REST-like interface. Connections can be made with any HTTP enabled programming language. The Giphy API also implements CORS, allowing you to connect to Giphy from JavaScript / Web browsers on your own domain.
name: Giphy
title: Giphy

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Search all Giphy GIFs for a word or phrase. Punctuation will be stripped and ignored. Use a plus or url encode for phrases.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: number of results to return, maximum 100. Default 25.

optional_parameters.name: rating
optional_parameters.description: limit results to those rated (y,g, pg, pg-13 or r)

api_list.name: Get GIF by ID
api_list.description: Returns meta data about a GIF, by GIF id. In the below example, the GIF ID is "feqkVgjJpYtjy"
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://giphy.p.rapidapi.com/v1/gifs/feqkVgjJpYtjy"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "giphy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://giphy.p.rapidapi.com/v1/gifs/{gif_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "giphy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get GIFs by ID
api_list.description: A multiget version of the get GIF by ID endpoint. In this case the IDs are feqkVgjJpYtjy and 7rzbxdu0ZEXLy

api_list.name: Translate
api_list.description: This is prototype endpoint for using Giphy as a translation engine for a GIF dialect. The translate API draws on search, but uses the Giphy "special sauce" to handle translating from one vocabulary to another. In this case, words and phrases to GIFs. Use a plus or url encode for phrases.

required_parameters.name: s
required_parameters.description: term or phrase to translate into a GIF

optional_parameters.name: rating
optional_parameters.description: limit results to those rated (y,g, pg, pg-13 or r).

api_list.name: Random
api_list.description: Returns a random GIF, limited by tag. Excluding the tag parameter will return a random GIF from the Giphy catalog.

required_parameters.name: tag
required_parameters.description: the GIF tag to limit randomness by

optional_parameters.name: rating
optional_parameters.description: limit results to those rated (y,g, pg, pg-13 or r).

api_list.name: Trending GIFs
api_list.description: Fetch GIFs currently trending online. The data returned mirrors that used to create The Hot 100 list of GIFs on Giphy. Returns 25 results by default.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: limits the number of results returned. By default returns 25 results.

optional_parameters.name: rating
optional_parameters.description: limit results to those rated (y,g, pg, pg-13 or r).

api_list.name: Sticker Search
api_list.description: Replicates the functionality and requirements of the classic Giphy search, but returns animated stickers rather than gifs.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: number of results to return, maximum 100. Default 25

optional_parameters.name: rating
optional_parameters.description: limit results to those rated (y,g, pg, pg-13 or r).

api_list.name: STICKER Roulette
api_list.description: Returns a spotaneously selected sticker from Giphy's sticker collection. Optionally limit scope of result to a specific tag. Like the GIF random endpoint, Punctuation will be stripped and ignored. Use a hyphen for phrases. Example oops, birthday or thank-you. Search terms should be URL encoded.

api_list.name: STICKER Trending
api_list.description: Get the latest stickers trending on Giphy with this endpoint.

required_parameters.name: s
required_parameters.description: term or phrase to translate into a GIF

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: number of results to return, maximum 100. Default: 25

optional_parameters.name: fmt
optional_parameters.description: return results in html or json format.

optional_parameters.name: rating
optional_parameters.description: limit results to those rated (y,g, pg, pg-13 or r).

api_list.name: STICKER Translate
api_list.description: Using the same alogirithm as the GIF translate endpoint, the sticker translate endpoint turns words into stickers.

required_parameters.name: s
required_parameters.description: term or phrase to translate into a gif
